item.description:
Let’s have a bite to eat and then dance the night away at Corrine’s in Pawtucket, RI
On Friday Nov. 5.
We can meet for dinner at 7:00pm. Corrine’s has a pub menu at an affordable price.
Or just show up later to dance.
There are 2 bands playing - Jeff Pitchell & TEXAS FLOOD with 44 East Band “Blues & Classic Rock”.
There is a $10 admission fee which starts at 7:30pm.

Corinne's Banquets and Gastro Pub - 1593 Newport Avenue, Pawtucket, RI 02861
1593 Newport Ave
Pawtucket, RI 02861
(401) 725-4260
corinnesbanquets.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will be having a great time, and when the music starts I will be dancing!
item.name: Dancing the night away!
